title: Trophy & Achievement Guide
content:
Trophy & Achievement Guide for Baldur's Gate 3 covers information that indicates a list of all the trophies and/or achievements that can be obtained in order to achieve platinum or 100% completion rate for the PS4, Xbox One, and PC. Players can find information on how to obtain the following trophies/achievements that are listed below.

Baldur's Gate 3 Trophy & Achievement Guide

Icon Name Description Descent From Avernus Take control of the Nautiloid and escape the hell. Unmissable Storyline ac
